snippet: France’s Crédit Agricole flagged improving conditions in its main markets of France and Italy on Wednesday as it proposed its first shareholder payout since 2010.
lead_paragraph: France’s Crédit Agricole flagged improving conditions in its main markets of France and Italy on Wednesday as it proposed its first shareholder payout since 2010.

headline.main: Crédit Agricole Reports a Turnaround in Net Income
